mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_MALL_DISPATCH_INFO t where t.ORDERID = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MALL_DISPATCH_INFO ( ORDERID, COMPANYID, STATUS, RECEIVEORGID, RECEIVEORGNAME, I_YEAR, I_MONTH, I_SEASON, COMMITTIME, CASHDATE, TOTALAMT, PAYABLEAMT, PAYAMT, UNPAYAMT, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, TOTALNUMS, SALESAMT, SENDNUMS, RECEIVENUMS, DISPATCHNUMS, SENDORGID, SENDORGNAME, APPLYMANID, APPLYMANCODE, APPLYMAN, SENDCONTACTOR, SENDCONTACT, CHECKSTATUS, CHECKTIME, CHECKCODE, CHECKER, YWCODE, YWNAME, TYPECODE, TYPENAME, STATUSNAME, CHECKSTATUSNAME ) VALUES( #{info.orderId:VARCHAR}, #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, #{info.status:NUMERIC}, #{info.receiveOrgId:VARCHAR}, #{info.receiveOrgName:VARCHAR}, #{info.i_year:NUMERIC}, #{info.i_month:NUMERIC}, #{info.i_season:NUMERIC}, #{info.commitTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashDate:VARCHAR}, #{info.totalAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payableAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.unpayAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.totalNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.salesAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.sendNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.receiveNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.dispatchNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.sendOrgId:VARCHAR}, #{info.sendOrgName:VARCHAR}, #{info.applyManId:VARCHAR}, #{info.applyManCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.applyMan:VARCHAR}, #{info.sendContactor:VARCHAR}, #{info.sendContact:VARCHAR}, #{info.checkStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.checkTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.checkCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.checker:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywName:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.statusName:VARCHAR}, #{info.checkStatusName:VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO TB_MALL_DISPATCH_INFO ( ORDERID, COMPANYID, STATUS, RECEIVEORGID, RECEIVEORGNAME, I_YEAR, I_MONTH, I_SEASON, COMMITTIME, CASHDATE, TOTALAMT, PAYABLEAMT, PAYAMT, UNPAYAMT, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, TOTALNUMS, SALESAMT, SENDNUMS, RECEIVENUMS, DISPATCHNUMS, SENDORGID, SENDORGNAME, APPLYMANID, APPLYMANCODE, APPLYMAN, SENDCONTACTOR, SENDCONTACT, CHECKSTATUS, CHECKTIME, CHECKCODE, CHECKER, YWCODE, YWNAME, TYPECODE, TYPENAME, STATUSNAME, CHECKSTATUSNAME ) VALUES
( #{info.orderId:VARCHAR}, #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, #{info.status:NUMERIC}, #{info.receiveOrgId:VARCHAR}, #{info.receiveOrgName:VARCHAR}, #{info.i_year:NUMERIC}, #{info.i_month:NUMERIC}, #{info.i_season:NUMERIC}, #{info.commitTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashDate:VARCHAR}, #{info.totalAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payableAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.unpayAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.totalNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.salesAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.sendNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.receiveNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.dispatchNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.sendOrgId:VARCHAR}, #{info.sendOrgName:VARCHAR}, #{info.applyManId:VARCHAR}, #{info.applyManCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.applyMan:VARCHAR}, #{info.sendContactor:VARCHAR}, #{info.sendContact:VARCHAR}, #{info.checkStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.checkTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.checkCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.checker:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywName:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.statusName:VARCHAR}, #{info.checkStatusName:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MALL_DISPATCH_INFO SET COMPANYID = #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{info.status:NUMERIC}, RECEIVEORGID = #{info.receiveOrgId:VARCHAR}, RECEIVEORGNAME = #{info.receiveOrgName:VARCHAR}, I_YEAR = #{info.i_year:NUMERIC}, I_MONTH = #{info.i_month:NUMERIC}, I_SEASON = #{info.i_season:NUMERIC}, COMMITTIME = #{info.commitTime:VARCHAR}, CASHDATE = #{info.cashDate:VARCHAR}, TOTALAMT = #{info.totalAmt:VARCHAR}, PAYABLEAMT = #{info.payableAmt:VARCHAR}, PAYAMT = #{info.payAmt:VARCHAR}, UNPAYAMT = #{info.unpayAmt:VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, TOTALNUMS = #{info.totalNums:NUMERIC}, SALESAMT = #{info.salesAmt:VARCHAR}, SENDNUMS = #{info.sendNums:NUMERIC}, RECEIVENUMS = #{info.receiveNums:NUMERIC}, DISPATCHNUMS = #{info.dispatchNums:NUMERIC}, SENDORGID = #{info.sendOrgId:VARCHAR}, SENDORGNAME = #{info.sendOrgName:VARCHAR}, APPLYMANID = #{info.applyManId:VARCHAR}, APPLYMANCODE = #{info.applyManCode:VARCHAR}, APPLYMAN = #{info.applyMan:VARCHAR}, SENDCONTACTOR = #{info.sendContactor:VARCHAR}, SENDCONTACT = #{info.sendContact:VARCHAR}, CHECKSTATUS = #{info.checkStatus:NUMERIC}, CHECKTIME = #{info.checkTime:VARCHAR}, CHECKCODE = #{info.checkCode:VARCHAR}, CHECKER = #{info.checker:VARCHAR}, YWCODE = #{info.ywCode:VARCHAR}, YWNAME = #{info.ywName:VARCHAR}, TYPECODE = #{info.typeCode:VARCHAR}, TYPENAME = #{info.typeName:VARCHAR}, STATUSNAME = #{info.statusName:VARCHAR}, CHECKSTATUSNAME = #{info.checkStatusName:VARCHAR} WHERE ORDERID = #{info.orderId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_MALL_DISPATCH_INFO t WHERE t.ORDERID=#{orderId}

DELETE FROM TB_MALL_DISPATCH_INFO WHERE ORDERID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_MALL_DISPATCH_INFO t WHERE 1=1
and ( 2=1 or t.ORDERID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.COMPANYID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.RECEIVEORGID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.RECEIVEORGNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.COMMITTIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CASHDATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TOTALAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.PAYABLEAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.PAYAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.UNPAYAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CREATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.UPDATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TOTALNUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.SALESAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.SENDNUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.RECEIVENUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.DISPATCHNUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.SENDORGID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.SENDORGNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.APPLYMANID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.APPLYMANCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.APPLYMAN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.SENDCONTACTOR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.SENDCONTACT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CHECKSTATUS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CHECKTIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CHECKCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CHECKER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.YWCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.YWNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TYPECODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TYPENAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.STATUSNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CHECKSTATUSNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
order by t.UPDATETIME DESC
